term.title: ampholytic polymer

item.text: Polyelectrolyte composed of macromolecules containing both cationic and anionic groups, or corresponding ionizable groups.

notes.item: An ampholytic polymer in which ionic groups of opposite sign are incorporated into the same pendant groups is called, depending on the structure of the pendant groups, a zwitterionic polymer, polymeric inner salt, or polybetaine.

sources.item: PAC, 2006, 78, 2067. 'Terminology of polymers containing ionizable or ionic groups and of polymers containing ions (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 2068 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200678112067)
